1.content: Add code preview window to AI Code Generator
1.details: 1. Create a modal/popup window that displays generated Python code with syntax highlighting. 2. Add preview functionality after code generation completes. 3. Include proper code formatting and readability features.

2.content: Integrate MiniMax agent for code editing
2.details: 1. Connect to MiniMax API for code editing capabilities. 2. Create interface for clients to request code modifications. 3. Implement real-time code editing suggestions and improvements.

3.details: 1. Add text input for client editing requests. 2. Create edit/modify buttons in preview window. 3. Implement before/after code comparison view. 4. Add save/apply changes functionality.

4.details: 1. Deploy updated website with new preview and editing features. 2. Test code preview window functionality. 3. Verify MiniMax integration works properly. 4. Test complete workflow from generation to editing.
